info.title: hitbox API
info.description: Notice anything incorrect? Send me a tweet at the following contact information.

post.summary: Authenticates user with username and password.
post.description:
This API returns a object containing information about the authenticated user.


You can optionally pass just an 'authToken' value in JSON to return the same valid credentials object

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: User object that needs to be authenticated.

post.summary: Authenticates user with username and password, only returning an authentication token.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Status values that need to be considered for filter

parameters.name: token

parameters.name: channel
parameters.description: Name of channel to run ad on.

403.description: Title Too short, rec_session invalid, etc

parameters.name: liveonly

parameters.name: media

parameters.name: media_type
parameters.description: Populates the media object with live or video arrays

403.description: Returned when invalid Auth Token or Group is taken

406.description: Returned when invalid description or display name

put.description:
To upload a team icon you must do a [POST /upload/team/{user}/{auth}](/#!/upload/UploadTeam) which will return a logo->small and logo->large which then can be put into 'group_logo_small' and 'group_logo_large' respectively.


To delete a logo you must set the URL parameter 'action' to 'delete_logo'


To upload a team cover you must do a [POST /upload/team/{user}/{auth}](/#!/upload/UploadTeam) which will return a cover->cover which then can be put into 'group_cover'


To delete a cover you must set the URL paramter 'action' to 'delete_cover'


Deleting a cover or logo will return 'group_logo_small', 'group_logo_large', 'group_cover' as "" instead of null like a new team.


To disband a team you must set the URL paramter 'action' to 'delete_team' and PUT a valid body.

200.description: You will return a echo of the PUT body

delete.summary: Remove Team Member or Leave a Team

get.summary: Get Teams that User is in.

parameters.name: liveonly
parameters.description: Only show Live Streams when 'media_type' is live

parameters.name: media
parameters.description: Show Media Object. Used in conjunction with 'media_type'

parameters.name: media_type
parameters.description: Populates the media object with live or video arrays

parameters.name: user_name
parameters.description: Hitbox User to try posting to.

200.description: Successfully posted. (Currently this API always returns 400)

get.summary: List of channels a user is following.

get.description: Only returns 'isSubscriber' and 'isFollower' if the user never had higher access.

post.summary: Changes User Avatar or Channel Cover

post.description:
If you upload 'file', the cover object will be 'null'

If you upload 'cover', the logo object will be 'null'

parameters.name: file
parameters.description: file = Team Logo. cover = Team Cover
